plot outline: Kaaun is a fast-paced detective thriller backed up completely by dangerous situations, suspenseful drama and nail-biting excitement. Sweta, an Intelligence Bureau Officer Officer walks a tight rope as a popular crime solving whiz kid of the department on one hand and as a dutiful housewife and a caring mother on the other. Her clumsiness at home frustrates her husband who dotes on her and wants her to be smarter, unaware of her job at the IB. He has been led to understand that Sweta works as a journalist reporting on social problems and conducting interviews with personalities, to ensure that there are no complications in her married life due to the dangerous assignments she undertakes. Various situations make him suspicious of his wife leading to hilarious consequences.
